predicate.note: Frames file for 'chart' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: describe, as with a chart

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yet, the unassuming Mr. Corry helped *trace* chart USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil.
example.arg: USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil

roleset.note: Unlike describe, chart does not seem to take the 'description' or secondary predication arg.

roleset.name: describe, as with a chart

example.name: exactly the same as previous ex
example.text: Yet, the unassuming Mr. Corry helped *trace* chart USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil.
example.arg: USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil

roleset.note: Unlike describe, chart does not seem to take the 'description' or secondary predication arg.
